about_the_game:
PLOT

Determined to find unique and exclusive content, paranormal streamer Symon stumbles upon an obscure urban legend known only as the "Phantom Incident". Hardly any information of the event exists besides mentions in a small newspaper and stories from locals. Seeing this as a perfect scoop for his social media, he jumps at the opportunity to bring new light to the story and gain more followers in the process.

GAMEPLAY

  • Explore the Perigee Gas Station, Henderson Estate and surrounding area, solving puzzles and using your resources wisely to move forward.

  • Document your journey by filming segments and collecting evidence. The evidence you uncover will determine your understanding at the conclusion.

  • First person controls.

ADDITIONAL INFO

  • Fully voice acted (English only).

  • The game is roughly 45-60 minutes to complete and has multiple endings.

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes of spooks, some blood, a dead body, provocative magazine cover (bikini wearing woman).

name: Phantom Incident

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A paranormal streamer investigates an obscure urban legend referred to as the "Phantom Incident". In documenting the journey, the more he uncovers, the less it makes sense.
